text: Produce Plus Market catered a work function today and not only was the price on point.. everything was fresh!!!    Meatballs- fresh and delicious.. linguini- made with fresh tomatoes, buns from breadworks (fresh!) and fruit salad.. everything was delicious!   I highly recommend for catering ...
This is a small deli that I happenen into and tried both the potato salad (without egg) and the chicken salad. Both were delicious and I love to go here whenever I can.
The only non-grocery store deli in Bellevue.  It's a perfectly fine place to pick up a cheap hoagie--nothing too fancy.
